class.name: BTPauseAnimation
class.brief_description: BT action that pauses the playback of an animation on the specified [AnimationPlayer] node.
class.description: BTPauseAnimation action pauses the playback of an animation on the specified [AnimationPlayer] node and returns [code]SUCCESS[/code]. Returns [code]FAILURE[/code] if the action fails to get the [AnimationPlayer] node.
